name: The Projectile
description:
Game made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2 with the theme: "REWIND"

    Slay enemies with a unique mechanic and activate all pads in a puzzle style. The player can shoot one projectile, which he can rewind (max amount 5 seconds) and get back, being able to shoot it again.

    There's 2 types of enemies: Normal enemies, which can be killed by the player projectile regularly, and Rewind enemies, which can be killed by the player projectile while it's rewinding.

    Hostages must be kept alive to complete the level. They can be killed by the player projectile and enemy bullets.

    All pads must be activated in a certain amount of time to complete the level. They deactivate after a set amount of time. The normal pad can be activated by the player projectile while it's not rewinding, and deactivated by the player projectile while it's rewinding. The rewind pad can be activated by the player projectile while it's rewinding, and deactivated by the player projectile while it's not rewinding.

Controls:

  • Left click to launch the projectile (cant launch more than once)
  • Right click to slash (bounces the projectile towards the cursor and destroys enemy bullets)
  • Hold R to rewind the projectile (while its launched)
